interstates.name: California State Route 1
interstates.description: Highway 1 is part of the California Freeway and Expressway System and is eligible for the State Scenic Highway System.However, only a few stretches between Los Angeles and San Francisco have officially been designated as a scenic highway. The Big Sur section from San Luis Obispo to Carmel is an official National Scenic Byway.[6]

interstates.name: Pacific Coast Highway (PCH)
interstates.description: This stretch of road literally crosses the entire state, and does so along the coast. This drive is one of the most beautiful in the entire world and has been immortalized in hundreds of movies and songs. For myself I have never driven the whole thing,
